biotools.summary: The BAM Search Infrastructure - is a tool for extracting data from the 1000 Genomes phase 3 set of mapped reads (BAM files). It is a filtering tool - subsets of the ~60TB data can be specied and downloaded via the browser, with no need to download the entire data set.

bioschemas.name: BAMSI
bioschemas.summary: The BAM Search Infrastructure - is a tool for extracting data from the 1000 Genomes phase 3 set of mapped reads (BAM files). It is a filtering tool - subsets of the ~60TB data can be specied and downloaded via the browser, with no need to download the entire data set.
